# Pregunta 1

```{}
db.usage.find({track: {$exists: 1}}).limit(3).pretty()
```

# Pregunta 2

```{}
db.usage.aggregate(
  {$match: {"track": {$exists: 1}}}, 
  {$project: {tracks: {$size: "$track.features"}}}
)
```


# Pregunta 3

```{}
db.usage.aggregate(   
  {$match: {"track": {$exists: 1}}},
  {$replaceRoot: {newRoot: "$track"}},
  {$unwind: "$features"},
  {$project: {type: "$features.geometry.type"}},
  {$group: {_id: "$type", num: {$sum: 1}}}
)
```


# Pregunta 4

```{}
db.usage.aggregate({$match: {idunplug_base: 14}}, {$group: {_id: "$idunplug_base", tiempo_max: {$max: "$travel_time"}, tiempo_min: {$min: "$travel_time"}, tiempo_avg: {$avg: "$travel_time"}}})
```

# Pregunta 5

```{}
db.usage.aggregate(
  {$group: {_id: {$dayOfMonth: "$unplug_hourTime"}, travel_time_avg: {$avg: "$travel_time"}}},
  {$sort: {_id: 1}}
)
```

# Pregunta 6

```{}
db.stations.aggregate(
  {$limit: 1},
  {$unwind: "$stations"},
  {$match: {"stations.address": {$regex: /Calle Segovia/}}}
).pretty()
```

# Pregunta 7

```{}
db.stations.aggregate(
  {$limit: 1}, 
  {$project: {_id: {$dateFromString: {dateString: "$_id"}}}}
)
```


# Pregunta 8

```{}
db.stations.aggregate(
  {$addFields: {day: {$dayOfMonth: {$dateFromString: {dateString: "$_id"}}}}},
  {$match: {day: 8}},
  {$unwind: "$stations"},
  {$group: {_id: "$stations.free_bases", stations: {$push: "$stations.id"}}},
  {$sort: {_id: -1}},
  {$limit: 1}
)
```

# Pregunta 9

```{}
db.usage.aggregate(
  {$group: {
    _id: {idunplug_base: "$idunplug_base", idplug_base: "$idplug_base"},
    avg_travel_time: {$avg: "$travel_time"}
    }
  }
)
```

# Pregunta 10

```{}
db.stations.aggregate(
  {$unwind: "$stations"},
  {$group: 
    {
      _id: "$stations.id",
      states: {$push:
                {
                  timestamp: {$dateFromString: {dateString: "$_id"}},
                  free_bases: "$stations.free_bases"
                }
              }
    }
  },
  {$out: "stations2"}
)
```


```{}
db.stations2.aggregate({$project: {_id:1, states: {$slice: ["$states", 3]}}}, {$limit: 2}).pretty()
```
